Though I will not play them at all.. I am a fan of some of the Final Fantasy titles. I will download and seed.

.. At least, that was the plan... first time I ever had to use a magnet file... not entirely sure how they work tbh. If it works the same, you have another seed in the making.. if not... then I downloaded it for nothing ^_^;;

Anyway, I have tried PS2 emulation in the past and http://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/ps2/pcsx2.html was the best I could find. If you need the BIOS files, a good ol' google search should do the trick. 

Hope it helps,
